headline.main: GUADALCANAL PUSH KILLS 51 JAPANESE; Our Army and Marine Patrols Capture 3 Artillery Pieces and 6 Machine-Guns FOUR AERIAL BLOWS DEALT Foemen Who Have Lost Face With Their Main Forces Do Not Rejoin Them

abstract: US patrols kill 51 Japanese; capture arms; defeated Jap patrols reptd making no effort to rejoin main forces; marines under Lt G Maples ambush Jap unit southwest of Henderson Field; Berlin radio repts US convoy carrying reinforcements to Guadalcanal destroyed by Jap planes

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
